Key Match Events: Michael Conforto hit a home run for the 17th time this season
Yastrzemski hit a leadoff home run for the second night in a row, this time his 17th long ball of the season
Ryan O'Hearn's RBI double in the sixth closed the gap to 5-3
Post-Match Reflections: The Orioles (84-68) have lost eight of their past 10 games and are in danger of sliding out of the chase with the New York Yankees in the American League East
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Giants (74-78) won’t be in the postseason but they’re off to a nice start through two games of a nine-game road trip
San Francisco won the series opener 10-0 on Tuesday
Others: Hayden Birdsong (4-5) won for the first time in six decisions
Tyler Rogers and Ryan Walker each worked a perfect inning in relief
Gunnar Henderson had two of Baltimore’s seven hits
